description:
You get an option to download the video on the bottom left column of individual video player page.


Please go through this video for a walk-through of the download feature:



If the download button isn't working, refer this alternative method to download:
title: How can I download the videos?
description_text: You get an option to download the video on the bottom left column of individual video player page.     Please go through this video for a walk-through of the download feature:        If the download button isn't working, refer this alternative method to download:

description: The final video is of mp4 format and you can download it and use it wherever needed.
title: Will I be able to save the video file on my computer or drive?
description_text: The final video is of mp4 format and you can download it and use it wherever needed.

description:
In the step to add the media (photos, videos, text), click on the add button/icon. A media selection box will pop-up. Here, in the left side (section to add photo), there is a section called ‘Import from’, choose the ‘Facebook’ icon and add the desired photos. 


Note: If your Picovico account is not synced with your facebook, it will request you to input your credentials before extracting the images.
title: How do I import my photos from facebook?
description_text: In the step to add the media (photos, videos, text), click on the add button/icon. A media selection box will pop-up. Here, in the left side (section to add photo), there is a section called ‘Import from’, choose the ‘Facebook’ icon and add the desired photos.   Note: If your Picovico account is not synced with your facebook, it will request you to input your credentials before extracting the images.
